award_title: NSF-ANR CHE: Stereocontrolled Radical Polymerization of Linear and Cyclic Vinyl Monomers Through Cobalt-Based Metalloradical Catalysis
subject: Your stereocontrolled polymer synthesis work — getting used beyond the paper
body:
Hi Dr. Niu,

Your NSF-ANR project on cobalt-based metalloradical catalysis for biodegradable plastics addresses a real challenge in polymer chemistry. The problem is that computational workflows and datasets from research like yours often don't get reused—they stay locked in papers.

Ouro helps turn computational workflows, datasets, and notebooks into reusable building blocks that others in your field can actually plug into their work.

If you're curious, I can show you how it works.

Hope you're having a good winter break and happy holidays.

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
